org.apache.edgent.runtime.etiao.graph

Class DirectGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.edgent.graph.spi.AbstractGraph<Executable>
      • org.apache.edgent.runtime.etiao.graph.DirectGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph

    public class DirectGraph
extends AbstractGraph<Executable>
    DirectGraph is a Graph that is executed in the current virtual machine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectGraph(java.lang.String topologyName, ServiceContainer container)
      Creates a new DirectGraph instance underlying the specified topology.

      • insert

        public <OP extends Oplet<C,P>,C,P> ExecutableVertex<OP,C,P> insert(OP oplet,
                                                                   int inputs,
                                                                   int outputs)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Add a new unconnected Vertex into the graph.

        Type Parameters:
        OP - an Oplet type
        C - tuple type of input streams
        P - tuple type of output streams
        Parameters:
        oplet - the oplet to associate with the new vertex
        inputs - the number of input connectors for the new vertex
        outputs - the number of output connectors for the new vertex
        Returns:
        the newly created Vertex for the oplet
